meanings.definition: The act of adding flavor to food with spices.
meanings.sent1: I love the spicing in this curry; it makes it taste so good!
meanings.sent2: The spicing in the soup really brings out the flavors of the vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The spicing in the chili was so strong that it made my friend's eyes water.
meanings.sent4: Her spicing of the stew was like a symphony of flavors dancing on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The spicing of the chicken was so perfect that I couldn't stop eating.

meanings.definition: The act of making something more interesting or exciting.
meanings.sent1: The spicing of the story with unexpected twists kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent2: His spicing of the presentation with humor made it enjoyable for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The spicing of the party with games and music made it a night to remember.
meanings.sent4: Her spicing of the conversation with gossip added a touch of drama to the evening.
meanings.sent5: The spicing of the movie with action scenes made it thrilling to watch.
